title: Dark Mode vs Light Mode: The Eternal Debate
summary: Some love the glow of light mode, others swear by the sleekness of dark. But which is truly best for your eyes and code?
author: Joey

body.raw: Designers argue, users toggle, and developers try to please both. Let's break down the pros and cons of each and why dark mode might not be as restful as it seems.
